featured.text: Without the carbon dioxide released from the process, all plant life would die out.
An estimated 2.5 million tons of carbon dioxide were generated in 2006 by the production of plastic for bottled water.

definition.zh_def: 二氧化物，指含有兩個氧原子的化合物。
definition.en_def: A chemical compound that contains two oxygen atoms.
definition.example: Carbon dioxide is produced when we breathe out.
